column2: the Spicy Sauce on the table is also vastly different than the Chili Paste we use on the ramen line. The Spicy Sauce is essentially a souped-up (sorry) version of Sriracha sauce; whereas the Chili Paste contains more than 10 different ingredients. Therefore requesting additional Chili Paste is akin to asking for sour cream at a Tex-Mex restaurant.
